snippet: Forget egocentric New Year’s resolutions. It’s time for New Rules for how the world should work.
abstract: Bill Maher news analysis offers new rules, based on the premise of his book The New New Rules, for how the world should work in 2012 instead of new year's resolutions.
lead_paragraph: Forget egocentric New Year’s resolutions. It’s time for New Rules for how the world should work.

headline.seo: Bill Maher’s New Rules for the New Year
headline.main: New Rules for the New Year
headline.print_headline: New Rules for the New Year
